SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.repository

Interface HoldSecurityaccountSecurityJpaRepository.IHoldSecuritySplitTransactionBySecurity

Enclosing interface:
HoldSecurityaccountSecurityJpaRepository
public static interface HoldSecurityaccountSecurityJpaRepository.IHoldSecuritySplitTransactionBySecurity
Projection interface for results returned by the stored procedure holdSecuritySplitMarginTransaction for a given security currency.

The procedure consolidates both margin transactions (buys/sells on margin instruments) and security split events into a unified sequence of events per tenant, portfolio, and security account, each with computed factor units.

  • Method Details

    • getIdTenant

      Integer getIdTenant()
      The ID of the tenant owning the security and account.
      Returns:
      tenant identifier

    • getIdPortfolio

      Integer getIdPortfolio()
      The ID of the portfolio associated with the event.
      Returns:
      portfolio identifier

    • getIdSecurityaccount

      Integer getIdSecurityaccount()
      The ID of the security account in which the event occurred.
      Returns:
      security account identifier

    • getTsDate

      LocalDateTime getTsDate()
      The timestamp of the event.

      For margin transactions, this corresponds to the transaction time; for split events, the split execution date/time.

      Returns:
      event date and time as LocalDateTime

    • getFactorUnits

      Double getFactorUnits()
      Computed units factor for the event.
      • For margin transactions: units * asset_investment_value_2, with sign indicating buy vs. sell.
      • For split events: ratio of to_factor over from_factor.
      Returns:
      calculated factor units

    • getTenantCurrency

      String getTenantCurrency()
      The currency code of the tenant's base currency.
      Returns:
      ISO currency code for tenant

    • getPorfolioCurrency

      String getPorfolioCurrency()
      The currency code of the portfolio’s base currency.
      Returns:
      ISO currency code for portfolio

    • getIdTransactionMargin

      Integer getIdTransactionMargin()
      The ID of the underlying margin transaction, if applicable.

      Populated only for margin transactions; null for split events.

      Returns:
      margin transaction ID, or null if not applicable
